allProviders.name: Abbaco Natural Food
allProviders.description: Our restaurant in Puerto Pollensa, Abbaco Natural Food ,  is an establishment located on the seafront where you can enjoy a wide variety of healthy and balanced food , with a special oriental touch. Abbaco Natural Food&Sushi is ideal for those looking for good taste in a natural and vegetal space , with options for all tastes.
allProviders.address: Passeig Saralegui, 110, 07470 Port de Pollen√ßa, Illes Balears, Spanien

allProviders.name: MarChica Palma
allProviders.description: A symphony of delectable cuisine and stunning cocktails. Revel in an unforgettable experience that delights all senses.
allProviders.address: Carrer Torre de Paraires, 1, Ponent, 07015 Palma, Illes Balears, Spanien
